index.title: Employee Directory Application using Javascript SDK - Javascript - Dev Center - Appacitive
index.description: A simple employee directory sample App, presenting Appacitive data store and graph API using Javascript SDK.
index.keywords: todo, todo sample, javascript, samples, javaScript samples, javascript sdk samples, appacitive, javascript sdk, graph, data
index.header_app_description: Learn how to create a simple Employee Directory application using Appacitive as the backend to fetch data. This application uses Backbone.js to organize the code, and Twitter Bootstrap to organize the UI.
